data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Katsina, Nigeria a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Katsina, Nigeria
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 1,670,279 believers in the state of Katsina to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Jesus, teach the local leaders in Katsina, Nigeria to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Katsina. Through your servants plant 1,296 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Ukwa people.
Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Katsina, Nigeria.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give every church in the state of Katsina a passion to plant another simple church.

data.section_summary:
the state of Katsina, Nigeria has a population of 6,483,400.

We estimate Katsina has 1,670,279 people who might know Jesus, 1,649,857 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,163,264 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Katsina words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

location.name: Katsina
location.people_groups_list: Kanuri, Yerwa, Kadun, Baangi, Zarma, Iku
